creator: thakurhome@gmail.com
text:
As discussed with Philippe there is a need of function which can be used through scripting JScript/Beanshell which allows the thread to break that loop/iteration and go to the start of next loop/iteration from where ever in the script its called.

In short ON_SAMPLE_ERROR_START_NEXT_LOOP should be achieved using code from anywhere in script.

Regards
Jitesh

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Feature is in fact available through:
- Result Status action Handler
- If Controller + Test Action


So adding a function for this is not necessary
